ref.mixed-citation: Hahn YK, Paris JJ, Lichtman AH, Hauser KF, Sim-Selley LJ, Selley DE, Knapp PE (2016) Central HIV-1 Tat exposure elevates anxiety and fear conditioned responses of male mice concurrent with altered μ-opioid receptor-mediated G-protein activation and β-arrestin 2 activity in the forebrain.
